ygData.subject: Re: Rez changed
ygData.msgSnippet: One thing the high Lvl Clerics aren t thinking about is that fact once they add this what do you think the ppl that dies are gonna do?  Since ppl will only
ygData.messageBody:
One thing the high Lvl Clerics aren't thinking about is that fact once they
add this what do you think the ppl that dies are gonna do? Since ppl will
only have two hours to get their corpses rez'd they are gonna be begging ten
times as much as before. Before they had at least 24 hours to get it rez'd
now they have only 2 hours. When I get up high enough to rez I'm gonna rez
almost everyone that ask me for it, as long as I'm not logging, in the
middle of a fight or they don't TELL me to do it as in "Hey Azor come here
now and rez my corpse!!". Ask me nicely and I'll come running as long as
I'm not say in Nro and they are in Unrest, unless they get my teleported
there and back.
But I really hope the fix Plane of Fear by the time I'm high enough to go
there cause I wanna check that place out.

**************************
Azor Spellbound
Lvl 20 Human Cleric of the Rathe
**************************

> From: Mystik <mystik@...>
>
> i agree on some points mik..i do really get bothered by ppl asking me for
a rez
> once i enter the game or the zone......i don't mind doing it if i'm in the
> vicinity and have the time/mana, but to be asked to go to god knows where
and
> rez, that's quite ok...i'm there to play the game, and have fun
myself....i do
> wish they'd fix fear as well....seems a little insane to make the aggro
range
> that high...it was hard enough last time, but at least it was
playable....every
> time i've been on a fear trip since then, not one good thing has
> happened....even if we go in camo'ed, things that couldn't see invis
before now
> can
>
> Mikaela wrote:
>
> > From: "Mikaela" <mikaela1@...>
> >
> > I couldn't agree more, Azor. Verant seems totally preoccupied with
> > discovering and fixing ways players have found to make the game more
> > playable, rather than looking for positive changes that should be made
to
> > improve both the classes and the game, itself. It seems all they focus
on
> > is how to make things harder on the players.
> >
> > Why DON'T they fix Fear Plane, or do something to improve the gosh
awful
> > camping that is going on every single place where a decent item is
found.
> > Last weekend, we (our level 50s) went to like 7 different places to try
and
> > obtain items for some of us that didn't have them. This was at 10am EDT
on
> > a Sunday morning. Every single last place was camped and the lower
level
> > groups that were there told us they would be there all day and nite.
Since
> > there was really nothing else for us to do, (can't go to Fear and noone
> > needs exp anymore) we all simply logged and went about doing RL things
> > outside of EQ.
> >
> > Verant needs to wake up to the fact that their high level players are
> > getting fed up and bored, and THAT's why they are leaving and/or selling
> > their characters on ebay and looking for new games.
> >
> > Mik
